statements: SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points;
SELECT location, date_time FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level = 3;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level, date_time FROM toll_collection_points ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level < 2 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level, date_time FROM toll_collection_points ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 3 AND location LIKE '%highway%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level, date_time FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level BETWEEN 1 AND 2 ORDER BY id;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY congestion_level DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records, AVG(congestion_level) AS average_congestion FROM toll_collection_points WHERE date_time >= '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points WHERE toll_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, owner_name FROM vehicle_info WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level, COUNT(*) AS total FROM toll_collection_points GROUP BY location, congestion_level;

SELECT vehicle_type, owner_name, registration_date, location FROM vehicle_info JOIN toll_collection_points ON vehicle_info.toll_id = toll_collection_points.toll_id WHERE toll_collection_points.congestion_level < 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY registration_date ASC, owner_name DESC;

SELECT owner_name, location, congestion_level, vehicle_type FROM vehicle_info JOIN toll_collection_points ON vehicle_info.toll_id = toll_collection_points.toll_id WHERE toll_collection_points.timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY owner_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points;
SELECT id, location FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_types WHERE vehicle_capacity >= 5;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_capacity FROM vehicle_types WHERE vehicle_capacity < 5;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 2;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_capacity FROM vehicle_types ORDER BY vehicle_capacity DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM toll_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT t.id, t.timestamp, v.vehicle_type FROM toll_transactions t JOIN vehicle_types v ON t.vehicle_id = v.id;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, vehicle_type, speed FROM congestion_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT location, status FROM toll_booths WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, timestamp, average_speed FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM congestion_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(id) FROM congestion_data GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT DISTINCT location, status FROM toll_booths WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT plate_number, owner_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT timestamp, average_speed, congestion_level FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY timestamp ASC, average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points;
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM toll_collection_points ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 100;
SELECT amount FROM toll_payment_records WHERE location_id = 123456 AND payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, congestion_level, analysis_date FROM congestion_analysis WHERE congestion_level > 2 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection_points WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_speed > 60 ORDER BY vehicle_speed ASC
SELECT location_id, location_name, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM toll_collection_points GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM toll_payment_records WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT location_id, congestion_level, analysis_date FROM congestion_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND congestion_level <> 1
